May 1st, 2025:AU Small Finance Bank updated its schedule of charges for the Maximum and Exclusive Savings Accounts, with the new charges effective from this date.

April 22nd, 2025:AU Small Finance Bank announced its financial results for Q4 and the full fiscal year ended March 31, 2025 (FY25).

April 1st, 2024 (merger effective date):The merger between AU Small Finance Bank and Fincare Small Finance Bank became effective. All Fincare branches began functioning as part of AU Small Finance Bank from this date.

August 7, 2025:AU Small Finance Bank received in-principle approval from the Reserve Bank of India to transition into a Universal Bank.

August 4, 2025:AU Small Finance Bank and SBI Life Insurance announced a distribution partnership for SBI Life Insurance policies through AU's branch network.

July 21, 2025:AU Small Finance Bank reported a 16% rise in Q1 net profit (Q1FY26).

June 29, 2025:Morgan Stanley Asia (Singapore) sold 93.9 lakh shares of AU Small Finance Bank in a block deal on BSE.
